item.description:
We will continue discussing the concepts of Monetary Reform presented in the film shown at last month's MeetUp THE SECRET OF OZ and connect how those concepts relate to STATES' RIGHTS.

Specifically REASSERTING STATE SOVEREIGNTY AS PER THE 10TH AMENDMENT.

What does that actually mean?

Is it Succession?
Is it the same thing as Nullification?
Is it a waste of time since it is already in The Constitution anyway?
Is this a good thing?
A bad thing?
Or just some wack-jobs wanting to make a scene?

RECOMMENDED WEBSITE
http://www.tenthamend...

RECOMMENDED BOOK
"The Tenth Amendment and State Sovereignty: Constitutional History and Contemporary Issues" by Mark R. Killenbeck.

please join us for a great discussion and, as per usual, tasty organic snacks.
FREE

group.name: FREEDOM IS FUNDAMENTAL Book Club and Discussion Group

item.name: State Sovereignty : this effects me... how?
